OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study irinotecan hydrochloride . Patients stratify accord genotype UGT1A1 TA indel . - Group 1 ( TA genotype 7/7 , 7/8 , 8/8 ) : Patients receive irinotecan hydrochloride IV 90 minute leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour day 1 fluorouracil IV bolus 5 minute follow IV continuously 46 hour day 1-3 . - Group 2 ( TA genotype 6/7 , 6/7 , 5/8 , 6/8 ) : Patients receive treatment group 1 high initial dose irinotecan hydrochloride . - Group 3 ( TA genotype 5/5 , 5/6 , 6/6 ) : Patients receive treatment group 2 . In group , treatment repeat every 14 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients undergo blood collection baseline periodically study pharmacokinetics , dihydropyridine deaminase enzyme assay , pathway expression analysis .
